result.html: Bhí timpiste aigeHe had an accident.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí timpiste aigeHe had an accident.

result.eng: An accident happened to us on the way to Ireland.
result.ga: Ghabh timpiste dúinn ar an bhealach go hÉirinn
result.orig: Ghabh timpiste dúinn ar an bhealach go hÉirinn
result.html: Ghabh timpiste dúinn ar an bhealach go hÉirinnAn accident happened to us on the way to Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Ġaḃ timpiste dúinn ar an ḃealaċ go hÉirinnAn accident happened to us on the way to Ireland.

result.html: I gcás timpisteIn case of accident.
result.ponchtml: I gcás timpisteIn case of accident.

result.eng: The road was closed for fear of an accident.
result.ga: Dúnadh an bóthar ar eagla timpiste
result.orig: Dúnadh an bóthar ar eagla timpiste
result.html: Dúnadh an bóthar ar eagla timpisteThe road was closed for fear of an accident.
result.ponchtml: Dúnaḋ an bóṫar ar eagla timpisteThe road was closed for fear of an accident.
